stories.title: Kids Room Project
stories.storyText: One day a man sent a test project to wins academy. The test project was about a kid in a kid's room interacting with stuf

stories.title: Musical Teddy
stories.storyText: Musical Teddy is an interactable object which plays music for kids. one for sad kids and another for calm ones, to include different tastes.

stories.title: Antique Lamp
stories.storyText: Antique Lamp is a interactable object. It lights up in white when calm kids turn It on, but It will be blue for sad kids.

stories.title: Story Terminal
stories.storyText: You're using a story terminal right now...
